Seeing this chart after this brutal bear market has to revamp faith in Bitcoin.

However imperfect of a contraption it is-

having an opt-out option to protect your life’s work and savings from a corrupt local fiat system, is a huge boost to personal liberty- period.

People surprised by the ETH + BTC squeeze. Wait till you see what happens in 2024.

Simple clarity-

1. Only 2 tokens have crossed the chasm of being a crypto store of value.

2. ETH supply has run out and BTC's is shrinking to under 1% soon.

There. aren't. enough. coins.
Can you imagine what Blast’s TVL would look like if it was a 4/6 multisig instead of a 3/5?
